synopsis: In episode #9, hosts Devam and Ahir are joined by Vivek Menon, a passionate filmmaker and solutions consultant. The trio delves into the creative process behind Vivek's project 'New Normal,' exploring themes of identity, the challenges of collaboration, and the importance of expressing oneself through art.
quotes: The best way of learning is by doing it and putting yourself out there.
You should not let the fear of imperfection stop you from creating.
If you can prove to people that what you're making is interesting, they'll realize you're for real.
It's okay to not have everything figured out; just start somewhere.
The idea of success is not just about making it big, but about continuously growing in your craft.
You can't call yourself a filmmaker if you don't put your work out there.
Sometimes, the best inspiration comes from the cringiest sources.
The script is never done until the very last minute.
If you don't put yourself out there, no one else will recognize your worth.
Passion is something that develops through practice, not just something you have.
